title: Ashanti, Ray J, Ja Rule, Nelly, Kelis, Fat Joe & More Join DJ Cassidy To Perform Hits | Pass The Mic
author: Soul Train
description:
DJ Cassidy’s Pass the Mic: The BET After Party. DJ Cassidy spreads love and soul with some of his musical heroes as they pass the mic and perform their classic hits! Artists included: Nelly, Ashanti, Ray J, Ja Rule, Kelis, Jadakiss, Beenie Man, Mya, Wayne Wonder, Sean Paul, Akon, Mr Cheeks, Sunshine Anderson, Musiq Soulchild, Tamia, Fabolous, and Fat Joe. 
#DJCassidysPassTheMic #BETAwards #CulturesBiggestNight

localize.description:
DJキャシディのPass the Mic。BETアフターパーティー。DJキャシディが、音楽界のヒーローたちにマイクを渡して名曲を演奏してもらい、愛と魂を伝えます アーティストは以下の通りです。Nelly、Ashanti、Ray J、Ja Rule、Kelis、Jadakiss、Beeenie Man、Mya、Wayne Wonder、Sean Paul、Akon、Mr Cheeks、Sunshine Anderson、Musiq Soulchild、Tamia、Fabolous、Fat Joe。

localize.title: Ashanti, Ray J, Ja Rule, Nelly, Kelis, Fat Joe & More Join DJ Cassidy To Perform Hits | Pass The Mic

localize.description:
DJ卡西迪的《传话筒》。BET之后的聚会。DJ Cassidy与他的一些音乐英雄们一起传播爱和灵魂，他们传递话筒并表演他们的经典歌曲！这是他的一个机会。艺术家包括。Nelly, Ashanti, Ray J, Ja Rule, Kelis, Jadakiss, Beenie Man, Mya, Wayne Wonder, Sean Paul, Akon, Mr Cheeks, Sunshine Anderson, Musiq Soulchild, Tamia, Fabolous, and Fat Joe.

localize.description:
